CustomField.description: AD-130 - field to calculate the number of days until an action is due
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'In Progress') ), IF( ISBLANK(Due_Date__c), null, Due_Date__c - TODAY() ), null )
CustomField.label: Days until Action Due Date
